resources.string: Suggestions will auto-complete the French word you type to the corresponding translation in Spanish, without you doing anything. If you want to activate it, you will need to download a translation package that we will use to translate words.
The download of the translation package failed. Please check if you are connected to a Wi-Fi access point, and that you have access to the Internet, and retry.
Learn your Spanish words quickly and easily

The highest level you choose, the more questions there will be in each quiz. If you choose an easy level, there will be less questions, but you will train more. That\'s why we recommend you to choose a level adapted to yourself, the way you work, and the way you remember things.
What are we going to do today?

Vocabulario encourted an error and crashed the last time you used it. You can retry, or reset Vocabulario\'s data if it doesn\'t work. If it still doesn\'t work, erase the data from your phone\'s Settings.

An error report has been sent to us, and we will use it to repair the problem in an update, if the problem comes from our app. This report does not contain personal information, nor information used to identify you.
Are you sure you want to delete the data?
This will delete all Vocabulario\'s data, including all the words you added to your Collection, your settings, your user profile, and many more.
Personalize Vocabulario the way you want
Let me know when a review of the vocabulary is recommended
The level you chose might influence this option.
The level helps you learn your vocabulary depending on how you learn things. You can change below.
This action will reset all data on the app, including your Collection, your settings, and your user profile. You can\'t undo this operation!
Debug build - Do not use in production!
Click on the button to throw the dice!
Add new words to your Collection
Do you want to make a quiz?

This software comes with an EULA, or End-User License Agreement. This EULA helps you understaind how to use this software legally. Vocabulario is licensed under the Apache License, version 2.0, an open-source license. If you do not accept it, uninstall this software.
Where will this device be used?
If you choose this option, you will be able to create an user profile, and get reminders to check out your vocabulary.

If you choose this option, this application will be protected by an admin password known by the computer administrator and/or other school employees. Students won\'t be able to apply changes to settings without the admin password. No user profile will be created.
"Please set these settings carefully. You won't be able to change them without a full application reinstall . "
This password will be required while performing actions you select below to protect the application.
When do you want a confirmation?
Select when you want to confirm the access to different settings using the checkboxes below.
When the app is about to reset
When the user adds words in the Collection
Select the features you want to use in Vocabulario, and click on Next.

This option will display special spanish letters above the keyboard that you can use when you add new spanish words to your Collection. It is recommended to select it if you don\'t have them on your phone\'s keyboard.
Without an Internet connection, we can\'t set up Suggestions.
I understaind that all my Collection will be cleared, which means that all the words in it will be cleared too.
I understaind that my user profile will be lost.
I understaind that all data assiociated with this app will be lost.
Set up Vocabulario for your school

By being the administrator, you will be able to:

- Add words to the Collection without restriction,
- Control the access to app settings,
- Reset the app,
- Prevent the users from performing undesired operation with this app.

An admin password will be prompted every time an user will try to do something in the list above.
Enter an administrator password. If you forget it, you will have to uninstall/reinstall the entire app!
Confirm the password you just typed in.
Please configure the app before accessing to Settings
You can\'t make changes to settings if we don\'t know who you are!
This password will help you to manage some settings that are protected when you set up this app for your school.
This code will allow you to backup your password if you lose it.
Your password must be at least 4 characters long.

If you forgot your password, you can reset it using the Security Code that we gave you when you set up the app. If you continue, the app will switch to Emergency Block mode, in which you will not be able to use the app on this device. You can\'t leave Admin Block mode without providing the Security Code.
The Forgot password feature has been activated.\n\nTo reset your password, click on Unlock, and follow the instructions to confirm that you are the administrator.

If it wasn\'t you that locked the app, it might be a student that was using your device that locked it.\n\nYour device should have vibrated for 30 seconds when it has been locked, to alert people around about this.
Please enter the 6-digit security code to continue.
This device will vibrate for 30 seconds to alert people around.
Alerts people that the app has been locked by vibrating the device for 30s
The device now vibrates for 30 seconds.
Click on the + icon to add a new Word group.
An error report has been sent to us, and we will use it to fix our app in updates to come. If this is the first time you see this screen, click on Close. Else, click on Repair to see what you can do.
Get advanced options, such as storage options and permissions options.
Select this option if any of the other options work. Your Collection, user profile, quiz scores, and all other app data will be lost.
Enable Suggestions now to go faster when you type translations
An error occurred while verifying if Suggestions are activated.
Your word is too long to be translated
The connection to Google Play Services failed.\nIt may be because Google Play Services are not installed on your device, or their use is forbidden by Google or by the applicable laws.
An error occurred, and the word that you created is empty. Please try again. If the problem continues, try rebooting your phone or reset this app.
Adjust Suggestions settings, Collection behaviour, change advanced Collection, word and word group settings, or reset your Collection to start over.
Change quiz reminders, add a break for the holidays, manage known words or reset the level of each word.
Change your name, view or delete your activity, or switch your profile to an organization profile.

Enable Vocabulario's device admin to prevent uninstallation.

To uninstall Vocabulario in the future, go to Vocabulario > Settings > System settings > Uninstall Vocabulario, and follow the instructions. This admin will not do anything else than protecting Vocabulario from uninstallation.

If you use a mobile device management app in your organization, it could be useful to also block Vocabulario uninstallation from such apps.
This device admin belongs to your school\'s computer administrator. Continue?
Click this notification to fix this problem.
These settings are managed by your organization, and they need permissions to be modified. Managers can change the settings at any time.
This device belongs to your school. Your school admin manages Vocabulario, and can change some settings. This is what he can do:
Change Vocabulario settings, control how Vocabulario works, set rules on which features are available, reset the Collection or the entire app, or uninstall it.
Add word groups, delete them, modify them, or disable and enable Suggestions.

Verify who used Vocabulario recently, when, and where. The admin can also view what the student did during his session. Trying to uninstall or reset Vocabulario without his permission will send a warning to him, and it will be logged in the device.
View each quiz result, get the averages, and more.
For your security, you can\'t enable this setting because your parents are managing this device with Google Family Link.
Suggestions will help you when you add a new word to your Collection by translating the spanish word you type in English for you, automatically.
This feature will use about 80 Mo on your device, and 60 Mo of mobile data. Be sure to have enough mobile data left to download this.

While Suggestions can be useful, it can also make some mistakes. We use the Google Translate API to make Suggestions work, so please verify every time you save a word that it is the same word written in your book. We might remove Suggestions in new versions, so remember that it is only a tool.
Oops, there is a problem with your license

It seems like you didn\'t accept the terms and conditions of the Vocabulario license, the Apache License 2.0. Please accept these terms to use this software. If you don\'t accept them, we recommend that you uninstall this app from your device.
To enjoy the power of Vocabulario, click Next. Now the most powerful app to learn your spanish vocabulary is between your hands. Yes, there.
You can clear your Collection, reset your settings, or reset the whole application to start over again.
All your words and wors groups will be deleted. This is useful if you change your school or your teacher, or when you start a new year at school.

Allows an app to receive events regarding your Collection in Vocabulario. For example, an app might be able to take action when you add a new Word Group, when you delete a word or an entire Word Group, and many more.
Allows apps to access Collection-related permissions.
An attempt has been made to perform a reset operation on Vocabulario

Software on your device wants your permission to perform a reset operation on Vocabulario (e.g. full app reset or Collection reset). If you click Yes, this software will be able to perform such operation on Vocabulario. Do you want to give this permission?
This will completely remove Vocabulario and all of its data of your device. You can\'t cancel this.
Allows an app to ask you to perform reset operations on Vocabulario.
This will restore factory settings and will delete all your data of Vocabulario. It\'s useful if you want to start over.
Revove Vocabulario configuration and data from the Android system

This operation will ask your Android system to clear Vocabulario\'s data for you. It will reinstall the app on the system. All the permissions, notification-related settings, and all the system settings related to Vocabulario will be removed. This action is useful for troubleshooting.
This action will remove Vocabulario from your device. You can also do it by accessing to Settings > Apps > Vocabulario > Uninstall on your device.
Setting up Vocabulario so it\'s ready to go
It is recommended to select this option to track your results in time. Do not select this if you don\'t want to change your average after this quiz.
We recommend answering at 12 questions daily, but if you don\'t have enough time, you can answer at 7 instead.
Learn more about the version information and the legal information of the app.
This copy of Vocabulario is authorized and official. You will receive a notification if any problem is detected.
This copy of the app is not authorized or official, or it shouldn\'t run on this device.
This device is rooted and Vocabulario should not run on this device to avoid critical security issues.
Spanish is right between your hands.
If you send a help request to us, it might be useful to send this info with it. This will allow us to help you depending on your device, app version, Android version, etc.
The version name allows you to identify the version of Vocabulario you have on your device.
The version code is used by your device to identify Vocabulario versions.
